channel.title: Working 317 client and source that I can play locally on my PC
channel.description: Hello guys, I hope I am posting this under the right forum section. Basically, I use to code back in the day and have forgotten a lot. I am trying to look for a 317 source and client that is fully working (items, skills, npcs) that I can literally just run on my PC and then connect using the client (127.0.0.1). Sadly most of the download links for any sources/ clients are expired and or not working so if someone could help me out it is much appreciated.

item.title: Working 317 client and source that I can play locally on my PC
item.dc:creator: @InfusedScape InfusedScape
item.description:
@InfusedScape wrote:

Google “Acrylicx Source” and click the Runelocus one.

Read full topic
